(Temporal Staff Augmentation) \symbol{126}2019.

(until NatGeo get bought) \symbol{126}2018.

\rsthA{About Me}\label{about-me}\hypertarget{about-me}{}

I code Open Source on \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco}{GitHub.} I like to think \emph{outside the box} (but I mean it), so eventually hit the limits of what \href{https://python.org}{CPython} can do, then used \href{https://cython.org}{Cython}, also choke on the boundaries, then integrated \href{https://nim-lang.org}{Nim} to my workflow, so far is the most productive, and allows me to implement my ideas into unique software, not seen anywhere else.

\begin{itemize}

\item \href{https://nimwc.org/login}{Fullstack web Framework from scratch with unique features.}
\item \href{https://juancarlospaco.github.io/webgui}{Electron alternative, web technologies based crossplatform GUI Framework, compiles to few Kilobytes file.}
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/nim-gatabase\#gatabase}{Compile-time Type-safe Database ORM for PostgreSQL and SQLite, including prepared statements.}
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/nim-nimterlingua\#nimterlingua}{Compile-time Translation framework that translates unmodified source code with 0 cost at runtime.}.
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/faster-than-requests\#faster-than-requests}{Requests alternative with built-in multi-thread web scrapers and downloaders, 0 dependency.} ,
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/faster-than-csv\#faster-than-csv}{CSV module for Data Science, HTML Table view, faster than Pandas (at the time of writing it).},
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/faster-than-walk\#faster-than-walk}{Recursive os.walk() alternative with Glob patterns, faster than stdlib (at the time of writing it).}.
\item \href{https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Juan\_Carlos}{Async Libraries for all APIs of OpenStreetMap.}
\item \href{http://argentina-ni.ml}{Online Web Playground with Python syntax, machine code, Abstract Syntax Tree, UML SVG, QR Code, etc.}
\item \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/nim-pypi}{Python PIP alternative, uploads to PYPI (replaces Twine), single file, works on Docker \& Alpine.} ,
\item As a social activity, \href{https://t.me/NimArgentina}{I started the Nim Argentina community (Spanish, +100 people).}
\item \href{https://pypi.org/user/juancarlospaco}{I have some popular Python packages on pypi}
\end{itemize}

I contributed to popular open source projects like \href{https://github.com/juancarlospaco/peewee-extra-fields}{Peewee}, \href{https://nuitka.net}{Nuitka}, Ninja-IDE.


Arch Linux user, previously Debian/Ubuntu. I can effectively communicate technical information to non-technical people, I like to make things simpler. I have been coding Python more than 10 years, on small and big companies of the US. As a self-taught person, for me programming is always learning new things, is an adventure of a lifetime.

\rsthB{Education}\label{education}\hypertarget{education}{}
\begin{itemize}

\item University: \href{https://utn.edu.ar}{U.T.N.} (\href{https://www.openstreetmap.org/relation/1632167}{Argentina, Buenos Aires}), Systems Engineer. Python Programming; Linux LPI; Bilingual.
\end{itemize}
